chessboard.moves

Class QueensideCastle

  • java.lang.Object
    • chessboard.moves.GenericMove
      • chessboard.moves.Castle
        • chessboard.moves.QueensideCastle

  • public class QueensideCastle
extends Castle
    Class representing a queenside castle, which is a special move where the king castles with the rook on the queen's side of the board.

      • Fields inherited from class chessboard.moves.Castle
